column5: A 2 bedroom, 2 full bath oceanfront condo centrally located on popular Seawall Blvd. Walk across the street to Babe's Beach. The condo complex is family-friendly. The front desk is manned 24/7 by a helpful staff. There are two interior elevators and plenty of free parking on the north and south sides of the building.  The nightly rate DOES include the 9% Galveston City Hotel Occupancy Tax. Airbnb will collect the 6% Texas HOT. Both taxes are required to be collected.
column8: Useazatt View Condo / Prime Seawall Blvd. Location
